general: Dear Scorpios, it is time to free yourselves from the emotional ties that hold you back. Even though it may be painful, it is essential to honor your heart and explore new paths. The Moon in Taurus forms aspects with the nodes of fate, Mercury, and Venus, allowing you to carry sweet memories while moving toward the future. You will feel lighter and ready to build your best life following Neptune's entry into Aries, emphasizing the importance of living healthily and pursuing your dreams. This planetary shift heralds major transformations over the next 14 years. Tonight, when the Moon aligns with Jupiter, seek harmony and make a wish.
love: Take the time to reflect on your past relationships, it will help you move forward.
work: Be open to new opportunities that arise, they could change your trajectory.
health: Pay attention to your mental and physical well-being, start a new healthy routine.
advice: Dare to leave behind what no longer serves you.
teaser: Free yourself and move toward your future.
